38579.affected_area: Medicine Hat (Ranchlands and Northeast Crescent Heights)
live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
38579.summary: Some customers in Ranchlands and Northeast Crescent Heights area in Medicine Hat are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38579.title: June 16 - Medicine Hat (Ranchlands and Northeast Crescent Heights) l All Services - Outage (Resolved)
